虆字的基本解释

虆
léi
藤蔓。
土筐：“盖归反虆梩而掩之。”

虆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［léi］
［《集韻》盧戈切，平戈，來。］
古代盛土器。
[②]［léi］
［《廣韻》力追切，平脂，來。］
(1)藤蔓。
(2)攀援。

虆字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　虆； 康熙笔画：27； 页码：页1072第25
【唐韻】力追切【韻會】倫追切，?累平聲。蔓也。　又盧戈切，音螺。【孟子】蓋歸反，虆梩而掩之。【趙岐註】虆梩，籠?之屬。【詩·大雅】捄之陾陾。【傳】捄，虆也。【箋】築牆者，桴聚壤土，盛之以虆。　又【集韻】魯水切，音壘。義同。　【玉篇】與虆、藟通。【韻會】亦作?。

虆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
虆字的起名意思

暂无。

creeper
Basic explanation of words
creeper
léi
vine.
Earth Basket: "Cover it and cover it up."
creeper
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［léi］
["Ji Yun" Lu Ge cut, Ping Ge, come. ]
Ancient earthenware.
[②]［léi］
["Guang Yun" strives to pursue cutting, flat fat, come. ]
(1) Vines.
(2) Climbing.
creeper
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　qi; Kangxi Strokes: 27; Page Number: Page 1072 Page 25
【Tang Yun】Lun chasing after it [Yunhui] Lun chasing,? Tired and flat. Man also.　 Lu Ge cut again, Yinluo. [Mencius] To cover the back, to cover it up. [Zhao Qi's Note] Qibang, belong to the cage? 【Poetry·Daya】The stunner. [Biography] Stun, Feng Ye. 【Jian】The wall-builder gathers loam and grows it with glutinous rice.　 [Ji Yun] Lu Shui cut, sound barrier. The same meaning.　【Jade Chapter】It is connected with Xiao and Feng. [Rhyme Club] Also for?.
